channel.title: Lotto HippoScape - how can i make this? 317 deltascape
channel.description:
ok i have a couple questions here...
i have never worked with text or NPC names etc etc...
i want to create an item and modify an npc
For the npc i basicaly just want to change his name, i also want to add that when you talk to him he says wanna bu a lotto ticket 10k? and you can either answer Yes heres 10k and he gives you a lotto ticket and takes 10k or no thanks and it closes the interfance how can i do this?
for the item.. i want to create one using the base of a scroll.. so it will look like a scroll but be called Lotto ticket but has an option "Scratch" that has diferent chances of giving diferent amounts of money.
how could i dot anything of those?
